text: Va hamagi ʙa resmoni Alloh taolo [Qur'onu Sunnat] cang zaned va parokanda nasaved; va ne'mati [ʙuzurgi] Allohro ʙar xud ʙa jod ored, ki ci guna dusmani jakdigar ʙuded va u mijoni dilhojaton ulfat ecod kard va ʙa [lutfu ʙarakati] ne'matas ʙarodar suded; va [pes az on ʙa xotiri kufraton] ʙar ostonai partgohi otas ʙuded, [ki] Alloh taolo sumoro az on nacot dod. Alloh taolo, incunin, ojoti xudro ʙarojaton oskor mesozad; ʙosad, ki hidojat joʙed
